Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm very new to modding, and I'm just learning a bit of how to make a planet in Kerbal Space Program with Kopernicus.

Anyway, whenever I try to run KSP, the planet isn't appearing.

The planet is supposed to be in between Kerbin and Duna.

Here's a pastebin of my code, followed by the .body log:

https://pastebin.com/sMi9b7xQ

 

What am I doing wrong? Any advice?

I'd appreciate if I could figure out what's wrong with this. Hope I can get my own personal planet soon.

Try putting properties and template in the body tag.

Edited August 16, 2018 by sirchazzvader
